title: Tarea principal: Haz un plan de viaje a Bogotá, Colombia, incluyendo actividades, lugares turísticos, gastronomía y cultura local.
description: Haz un plan de viaje a Bogotá, Colombia, incluyendo actividades, lugares turísticos, gastronomía y cultura local.
intro: I have divided the task of planning a trip to Bogotá, Colombia into four functional areas: activities, tourist attractions, gastronomy, and local culture. Each area represents a distinct aspect of the travel planning process, allowing for a comprehensive and detailed travel plan.

subtasks.title: Activities
subtasks.description: Planning and organizing various activities to engage in during the trip.
subtasks.expected_output: A list of recommended activities with corresponding details.
responsibilities: Research and identify popular activities in Bogotá.
Create a daily itinerary with a mix of cultural, outdoor, and leisure activities.

subtasks.title: Research popular activities in Bogotá
subtasks.description: Identify and compile a list of popular activities and attractions in Bogotá, including cultural, outdoor, and leisure options.
subtasks.expected_output: List of recommended activities with descriptions and details.

subtasks.title: Create a daily itinerary
subtasks.description: Plan a daily schedule that includes a mix of cultural visits, outdoor adventures, and leisure activities based on the identified popular activities.
subtasks.expected_output: Detailed daily itinerary with activities, timings, and locations.

subtasks.title: Tourist Attractions
subtasks.description: Curating a list of must-visit tourist attractions in Bogotá.
subtasks.expected_output: A comprehensive guide to the top tourist spots in the city.
responsibilities: Research iconic landmarks such as Monserrate and Plaza de Bolívar.
Provide information on entry fees, operating hours, and transportation options to each attraction.

subtasks.title: Research Top Tourist Attractions
subtasks.description: Identify and list the top tourist attractions in Bogotá, including landmarks, museums, and cultural sites.
subtasks.expected_output: List of must-visit tourist attractions in Bogotá.

subtasks.title: Gather Information on Entry Fees and Operating Hours
subtasks.description: Research and compile information on entry fees, operating hours, and any other relevant details for each tourist attraction.
subtasks.expected_output: Detailed information on entry fees and operating hours for each attraction.

subtasks.title: Explore Transportation Options
subtasks.description: Investigate and outline transportation options to reach each tourist attraction, including public transportation, taxis, or walking routes.
subtasks.expected_output: List of transportation options to access each tourist attraction.

subtasks.title: Gastronomy
subtasks.description: Exploring the local culinary scene and recommending dining experiences.
subtasks.expected_output: A selection of restaurants and dishes that showcase Colombian cuisine.
responsibilities: Identify traditional Colombian dishes to try, such as arepas and bandeja paisa.
Suggest restaurants known for serving authentic Colombian food.

subtasks.title: Identify Traditional Colombian Dishes
subtasks.description: Identify and list traditional Colombian dishes that are must-try for visitors.

subtasks.title: Recommend Authentic Colombian Restaurants
subtasks.description: Research and recommend restaurants in Bogotá known for serving authentic Colombian cuisine.
subtasks.expected_output: List of recommended authentic Colombian restaurants in Bogotá.

subtasks.title: Local Culture
subtasks.description: Immersing in the cultural aspects of Bogotá, including art, music, and traditions.
subtasks.expected_output: Insights into the vibrant culture of Bogotá and recommendations for cultural experiences.
responsibilities: Research art galleries, museums, and cultural events in the city.
Provide information on traditional festivals and cultural practices unique to Bogotá.

subtasks.title: Research Art Galleries and Museums
subtasks.description: Identify prominent art galleries and museums in Bogotá showcasing local and international artworks.
subtasks.expected_output: List of recommended art galleries and museums to visit in Bogotá.

subtasks.title: Explore Traditional Festivals and Cultural Events
subtasks.description: Research traditional festivals and cultural events unique to Bogotá, including dates and locations.
subtasks.expected_output: Compilation of upcoming traditional festivals and cultural events in Bogotá.
